data.message:
I'll be thankful when fb stop showing my friends pages that I like and I don't want my friends to see!
Even if I put  (privacy) >>> (only me) >>> they can see those pages and know what I like !! -_-
So, we need more privacy not just News Feed with a fresh new look !!   
Can anyone tell me where is the privacy in the story ??
O_o_o_O

replies.message: What privacy???  That went out the window a long time ago.  As long as they keep making money, that's all they care about.  They used to care about us, but not any more!!!  I have said several times before, STOP TRYING TO FIX THINGS THAT AREN'T BROKEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I agree with everybody else for why they DON'T like the change! Put it back the way it was PLEASE!
There is no such thing as privacy anymore. If you want privacy, get off the internet. Even then people will still be able to see what you've done up until then. "Privacy" is a thing of the past.
Since when has FB cared about us ? It has only had the $$$$$$ of the advertisements in mind !

I am proud of everybody who commented, but !!! :3  
Does anyone proud of Facebook ?  -_-
Facebook is as bad as Yahoo. They both ruin what you like about it and give you stuff you hate in return.
